• Working on a highly scalable USSD mobile banking solution
  • Assisted on the development of case management system for bank analysts.
  • Developed a Credit Scoring system called PICO for the abnk and and its customers.

• Worked on a realtime irregular shape area calculator for our publication called Developing a cost-effective and heuristic tool to solve cut order planning problems in the apparel industry published on Inderscience.
  • Developed a full scale ERP web and mobile app for the garment industry consisting of HR, Finance, Cut Order Planning, Packing modules.

• Trained more than 3500 student in Ethiopia about Electronics and Hardware programming for free.
  • Developed few Robotics projects with my students.
  • Developed a mobile application to give more insights and example codes about our educational kits and program them right from the app.
• Assisted the development of a mobile application platform to organize WAX NFTs and balance them in one place.
